verbose_text: Moreover, the HMGA1 promoter activity was found to be activated by TGF-beta1 in the MCF-7 and MDA-MB-231 cells and we found that specificity protein 1 (Sp1) was involved in the TGF-beta1-induced HMGA1 promoter activity, as shown by luciferase activity assay.
evidence: HMGA1 promoter activity was found to be activated by TGF-beta1
